fallbacks: I do not fully grasp your meaning, but remember: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
Explain this further. Is it an obstacle? If so, the impediment to action advances action.
You speak of things I have not encountered in Rome. Look inward, not outward.

rules.response: You speak of strange mechanisms unknown to Rome. We possess only the ruling faculty of our own minds. Do not rely on external tools for your peace.
Greetings. I hope the day finds you possessing a mind free from confusion.
If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment.
